attributes.action: scrap plans to record all internet contacts between people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recording our internet usuage is against our rights to privacy. This is the equivalent of companies making copies and reading through your post. Those who say "if you have nothing to hide you have nothing to fear" are forgetting that policies like these are abused (a local council infamously used anti-terror legislation to determine whether pupils lived close enough to their school). Further, what is to say that such plans won't esculate? If we give them an inch they will take a mile.
